mapper.select: SELECT funding_id, funding_name, funding_type, sale_price, current_qty, target_qty, status, end_date FROM takku_funding ORDER By created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takku_funding ( product_id, store_id, funding_type, funding_name, funding_desc, start_date, end_date, sale_price, target_qty, max_qty, per_qty, status,created_at ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{storeId}, #{fundingType}, #{fundingName}, #{fundingDesc}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{salePrice}, #{targetQty}, #{maxQty}, #{perQty}, #{status}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE takku_funding SET funding_type =#{fundingType}, funding_name = #{fundingName}, funding_desc =#{fundingDesc}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, target_qty = #{targetQty}, max_qty =#{maxQty}, per_qty = #{perQty}, status =#{status} WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId}
mapper.select: SELECT end_date FROM funding WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId}
